about.title: About Me
about.description: Full-Stack Developer with +3 years of experience, specialized in Vue.js and Node.js. I work on both corporate and autonomous projects, developing complete systems from planning to production deployment. I have experience with RESTful APIs, relational databases, containerization with Docker, and deployment on Linux servers. I constantly seek to improve my skills through courses and practical projects.
